content: Investments Stocks Discussion Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 21 Jun 2019Are we able to purchase mutual funds listed overseas? Such as Vanguard Global Bond Mutual fund?Are we able to purchase mutual funds listed overseas? Such as Vanguard Global Bond Mutual fund1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 25 Jun 2019Yes same rules apply when purchasing a foreign ETF. Just need to find a distributor platform that provides it. Do take note of the withholding tax like your equity investments. If they pay more dividends, you pay more tax, this is especially concerning for distributing bond funds.0 comments2
